main.name: Francis Frago
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe code
main.bio: Hey there, the name is Francis! I've been coding for 2 years and I am a certified Full Stack Developer in three programming languages - Python, Java, and MERN. I have a passion for learning new technologies and expanding my programming knowledge while discovering new techniques and solutions with each software project I create. The process is very rewarding and the journey keeps me motivated. I enjoy collaborating and contributing my skills and experience whenever I can. I come from a business management background with 10+ years experience overseeing daily business operations in the airline logistics field. I'd love to work with you on creative new projects!

education.description: Belt Certificaiotn in Python, Java, MERN

work.title: General Manager of Operations
work.description: Leading a logistic service provider in the aviation industry.

projects.title: Uber Clone
projects.category: React Native, Redux, Google Map API

testimonials.text: Francis is absolutely excellent, his knowledge & mentorship meant a lot... I would definitely recommend
Collaborating with Francis was great, he made awesome contributions making our project stand out while being available to help other team members!
